full_description:
STATA Smart Strip Light

The STATA Smart Strip Light is a flexible and adaptable lighting system that allows you to easily modify your area. You may cut and bend the 5M strip light to fit any form or size, and glue it to any surface with the adhesive tape. You may pick from 16 million hues to create your own mood, or you can sync the light with music to have it dance to the beat. You may also program the STATA Smart Strip Light to turn on and off, or choose from pre-set scenarios to match different moods. You can manage the light with the StataLife app from anywhere in the globe, or you can use your voice with Amazon Alexa or Google Home. STATA Smart Strip Light also features a dimmer setting that allows you to adjust the brightness to your desire.

Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at lowest price. The STATA Smart Strip Light comes with 1-year replacement and 5-year service warranty.

title: Deepcool Remote RGB Controller
product_list_short_description: Attachable receiver unit in front I/O port
cat_seo_title: PC Lighting & LED Strips Prices in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy PC Lighting & LED Strips at best price in BD. Beautify your gaming setup with high quality devices. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch.
product_page_short_description: Attachable receiver unit in front I/O port
full_description:
Deepcool Remote RGB Controller

Deepcool Remote RGB Controller is an attachable RGB light controller that can be attached to control the total RGB lighting setting of  a gaming setup. This controller is for those who prefers a manual approach to their gaming rigs and doesn't want to install a clunky software for that. The system has  two main parts. The reciever unit and the remote controller unit. The RGB Controller system's included receiver unit and magnetic remote controller can easily attach to any steel or magnetic metal case. The setup is also very easy and fast. You just have to plug in a 4-pin RGB wire and SATA power cable to the receiver and the remote controller can wirelessly control numerous lighting effect presets as per your requirements. And you dont have to install any software for it.The system is powered by the power connector and the remote controller is powered with a 3V button CR2025 battery. Normally 2 pieces are included in the Package. If the battery runs out on the remote controller, the receiver unit features a button to manually switch lighting functions or turn on/off. And as an added bonus, the receiver unit can also be attached to the front I/O reset button for convenient control outside the casing. With the included adaptor, The RGB Controller can also control any non-DeepCool RGB products with a standard 4-pin 12V RGB connector. Deepcool Remote RGB Controller offers No warranty.

Deepcool Remote A-RGB Controller

Deepcool Remote A-RGB Controller is an attachable RGB light controller that can be attached to control the total Adressable RGB lighting setups of  a gaming builds. This controller is for those who prefers a manual approach to their gaming rigs and doesn't want to install a clunky software for that. The system has  two main parts. The reciever unit and the remote controller unit. The RGB Controller system's included receiver unit and magnetic remote controller can easily attach to any steel or magnetic metal case. The setup is also very easy and fast. You just have to plug in a 4-pin A-RGB wire and SATA power cable to the receiver and the remote controller can wireless control numerous lighting effect presets as per your requirements. And you dont have to install any software for it.The system is powered by the power connector and the remote controller is powered with a 3V button CR2025 battery. Normally 2 pieces are included in the Package. If the battery runs out on the remote controller, the receiver unit features a button to manually switch lighting functions or turn on/off. And as an added bonus, the receiver unit can also be attached to the front I/O reset button for convenient control outside the casing. With the included adaptor, the RGB Controller can also control any non-DeepCool A-RGB products that have a standard 4-pin 12V RGB connector. Deepcool Remote A-RGB Controller offers No warranty.

full_description:
DeepCool RGB 350 Multi-Color LED Strips

DeepCool RGB 350 Multi-Color LED Strips are a great choice for a PC enthusiast who wants to decorate their gaming setup with additional lighting. This lighting strip supports magnet-mounting for iron-based surfaces and the fitting is very sturdy. This RGB lighting strip has a long life of 100,000 hours of ultra-bright LED with 3 primary colors. The power output is DC 12±5% V and the operating temperature is minus 25 to 60â„ƒ This light strip is only good as Indoor use. The dimensions are 166 x 30 x 275 mm for each strip. Every strip has 18pcs of RGB LED light. The power consumption for these strips are very low. The power consumption for is 120mW for Red; 90mW for Green; 90mW for Blue. The minimum consumption is 20mA for Red, Green and Blue while the maximum consumption is 200mA for Red, 100mA Green 100mA for Blue. This strip has various lighting modes including adjustable color, flash-rates, and breathing effects and many more and they can be conveniently adjusted using a remote control that is included in each package. DeepCool RGB 350 Multi Color LED Strips offers 01 year warranty.

full_description:
Corsair iCUE LT100 Smart Lighting Towers Starter Kit

The Corsair iCUE LT100 Smart Lighting Towers Starter Kit will improve the RGB lighting setup on your PC. This kit comes with two lighting towers, each with 46 customizable LEDs and housed in light-diffusing casings for a soft, blended light effect. You can create captivating and synchronized lighting effects across your entire system with 11 pre-set lighting profiles and the option to sync with other iCUE-compatible devices via the CORSAIR iCUE software. Enjoy the versatility of a removable headset holder while immersed in ambient lighting that integrates with your games and media. You can transform your PC setup into a visually stunning and immersive experience with the Corsair iCUE LT100 Smart Lighting Starter Kit.

full_description:
Lian Li UF-EX ARGB Device Cable Kit

The Lian Li UF-EX ARGB Device Cable Kit lets you take control of more LIAN LI ARGB products either via the Uni Hub or via synchronization with the motherboard. With 5 types of cables, 2 of each, the ARGB Device Cable Kit is the solution to connect all the devices required for an outstanding build. It supports Strimer/ Strimer Plus/ Galahad AIO/ ST120/ Bora Digital/ LANCOOL II Side Diffused LED Strip/ O11D XL light bar/ DK-04F&05F light bar. The Lian Li UF-EX ARGB Cable Kit has no warranty.
